name: Save The Egg (Morfy)
description:
Save The Egg NO ANIMALS WERE HARMED DURING THE MAKING OF THIS GAME!

The volcano has erupted! Don't drop the egg and protect it from the falling rocks!

How to play

Don't drop the egg. Don't touch the rocks.
Arrow keys to move. Spacebar to jump.

Credits

game by Morfy
music by Joshua McLean
